pr_title: Issue 4823: Pravega 0.8 does not build on JDK14 - Upgrade Lombok to 1.18.12

timeline.message:
Pravega 0.8 does not build on JDK14 - Lombok issues
- Upgrade Lombok from 1.18.4 to 1.18.12
- adapt code to changes to Lombok (Wither annodation and Builder.Default annotation)

Fixes #4823

Signed-off-by: Enrico Olivelli <eolivelli@apache.org>

timeline.bodyText:
fields with a Default value now works differently and you do not have a field that holds the value
see https://projectlombok.org/features/Builder
timeline.author: eolivelli

timeline.message:
Address review comments and remove last @Wither annotation

Signed-off-by: Enrico Olivelli <eolivelli@apache.org>

timeline.bodyText:
nice trick @shrids !
addressed your comments
thank you
timeline.author: eolivelli
